message.content:
cs.IT, cs.SY, cs.NI, cs.MA, cs.LG. 

This paper proposes a metric for evaluating the timeliness of status updates in remote control systems, which is relevant to several sub-fields of computer science. The use of stochastic evolution and context-aware importance suggests a focus on information theory (cs.IT) and systems and control (cs.SY). The application to Internet of Things (IoT) and multi-user systems suggests a focus on networking and internet architecture (cs.NI), machine learning (cs.MA), and machine learning (cs.LG).
